talksYaml.title: The PyOhio 2022 Mix Tape
talksYaml.description:
If you couldn't get enough of the sweet, sweet hold music from PyOhio 2022, then you'll love this bonus video -- all of the 2022 tunes in a tasty, seamless mix! All songs are curated from the YouTube audio library. Turn up the volume, turn down the lights, and remember when you spent a sunny Saturday learning about all things Python.

Track list:

  • 0:00:05: "Hello 6am" - Mylar Melodies
  • 0:01:46: "New Morning" - TrackTribe
  • 0:05:04: "Icelandic Arpeggios" - DivKid
  • 0:07:50: "RhythmOrganyzer (PyOhio Remix)" - Noir et Blanc Vie
  • 0:11:47: "Straight Fuse" - French Fuse
  • 0:13:20: "Tropic Fuse" - French Fuse
  • 0:15:06: "Nine Lives" - Unicorn Heads
  • 0:20:08: "Instant Crush" - Corbyn Kites
  • 0:22:01: "Indigo" - Eveningland
  • 0:23:28: "Juno in the Space Maze" - Loopop
  • 0:24:51: "Game Plan" - Bad Snacks
  • 0:26:32: "Morpho Diana" - Rachael K Collier
  • 0:28:59: "Far Away" - MK2
  • 0:30:41: "Lilac Skies" - Corbyn Kites
  • 0:32:26: "Out on My Skateboard" - Mini Vandals
  • 0:35:31: "Sky Scraper" - Geographer
  • 0:38:42: "Cologne 1983" - Josh Kirsch / Media Right Productions
  • 0:40:25: "Karma Cat" - Dyalla
  • 0:42:49: "Jungles" - Text Me Records / Bobby Renz
  • 0:44:38: "Hiking" - Silent Partner
  • 0:46:21: "Nadie Es Ilegal" - Ashley Shadow
  • 0:48:47: "So Long Analog" - Noir et Blanc Vie
  • 0:51:11: "Newsroom" - Riot
